shoes.name: Luka 3 PF 'Motorsport'
shoes.description: In love with the classic look of '80s basketball but have a thing for the fast-paced culture of today's game? Meet the Nike Court Vision Low. A classic remixed with at least 20% recycled materials by weight, its crisp upper and stitched overlays keep the soul of the original style. The plush, low-cut collar keeps it sleek and comfortable for your world.
